title: Natural Language Interaction for Patient Monitoring
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to use voice commands to quickly access and monitor my patients' health data so that I can efficiently check vital signs and respond to any anomalies without navigating complex menus.

title: Real-Time Health Monitoring Alerts
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to receive real-time alerts for abnormal health readings so that I can quickly address any potential health issues and ensure the well-being of my patients.

title: Seamless Communication Channels – Video Calling Capabilities
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to have seamless video calling capabilities in the ALFRED system so that I can maintain regular communication with my patients, especially those who are socially isolated, without the need for complicated setups.

title: Simplified User Interface for Health Monitoring
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want an intuitive interface that allows me to quickly access patient health metrics and communicate with them, so that I can efficiently monitor their health and maintain connections with those who are socially isolated.

title: Contextual Assistance for Health Management
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want ALFRED to provide contextual prompts for health management so that I can efficiently monitor my patients' health and maintain regular communication with them, especially those who are socially isolated.

title: Privacy-Respecting Data Access – User-Controlled Consent for Data Sharing
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to have secure access to my patients' health data while respecting their privacy preferences so that I can effectively monitor their health status and provide personalized care.

title: Task Management Support - Reminders for Caregiving Tasks
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to set reminders for medication tracking and appointment scheduling so that I can efficiently manage my patients' health and maintain regular communication with them.

title: Feedback on Caregiver Experience
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to provide feedback on my experiences using the ALFRED system so that the platform can be improved to better support my needs and those of my patients.
